articles.title: This Google experimental app lets you run powerful AI models without Wi-Fi - Android Police
articles.summary: This Google experimental app lets you run powerful AI models without Wi-Fi Google has quietly launched an experimental app called AI Edge Gallery, allowing users to run AI models on their devices without needing a Wi-Fi or cellular connection. The app supports several open-source AI models from platforms like Hugging Face, including Google’s own Gemma 3n. The app is currently...
